i.name: Salvation
i.description: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

q.name: Starcall
q.description: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers health and gains movement speed when moving away from enemy champions.

w.name: Astral Infusion
w.description: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.

e.name: Equinox
e.description: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.

r.name: Wish
r.description: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.

riot.name: Salvation
riot.description: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

i1.name: Salvation
i1.blurb: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Soraka''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|70% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when moving towards allied [[champion]]s below {{as|{{sti|health|40% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}.
notes: * Similar to {{cai|Feast|Cho'Gath}}, Soraka will be able to recognize champions under the health threshold for the sake of both ''Salvation'' and {{ai|Wish|Soraka}}.

* The movement speed of ''Salvation'' only applies when Soraka is facing in the direction of her low-health ally, even if her line of sight is obstructed by terrain. Merely pathing towards their location will not necessarily grant her the buff.

** A line of arrows points to allied targets, similar to that displayed by {{cai|Dark Passage|Thresh}} or {{cai|Last Breath|Yasuo}}, indicating the direction in which she can gain the bonus movement speed.

riot.name: Starcall
riot.description: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers health and gains movement speed when moving away from enemy champions.
riot.tooltip:
Calls down a star from Soraka to a target location. Enemies standing in the explosion radius take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

If Starcall hits a champion Soraka gains Rejuvenation for {{ e5 }} seconds, which restores {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) health per second and grants {{ e9 }}% movement speed when not moving toward enemy champions.

q1.name: Starcall
q1.blurb: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers health and gains movement speed when moving away from enemy champions.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Soraka''' calls down a star at the target area, landing after {{pp|type=target range|16|0.25 to 1|50 to 800}} seconds, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies hit by 30% for 2 seconds.
q1.description2: Hitting at least one enemy [[champion]] returns the star dust toward '''Soraka''', granting her ''Rejuvenation'' for 4 seconds, {{tip|heal|healing}} her every {{fd|0.5}} seconds and granting her {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when not moving towards enemy champions.
q1.leveling2: {{st|Heal Per Half Second|{{ap|7 to 11}} {{as|(+ 5% AP)}}|Total Self Heal|{{ap|7*4*2 to 11*4*2}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
q1.description3: While '''Soraka''' is '''Rejuvenated''' she can ''Rejuvenate'' other allies with {{ai|Astral Infusion|Soraka}}.
notes: * ''Starcall'' grants {{tip|sight}} of the target area before it lands.
* ''Starcall'' counts as hitting even if it gets blocked by [[spell shield]]s or {{ai|Riposte|Fiora}} granting ''Rejuvenation''.
* {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}} can block the ''Rejuvenation'' projectile.

riot.name: Astral Infusion
riot.description: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.
riot.tooltip:
Restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health to another champion ally.

If cast while affected by Rejuvenation, Soraka will grant her target its benefits for {{ f1 }} seconds.

Cannot be cast if Soraka is below 5% Health.

w1.name: Astral Infusion
w1.blurb: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.
w1.description2: ''Astral Infusion'' cannot be self-cast, nor can it be cast if '''Soraka''' is {{as|{{sti|health|below 5% '''maximum''' health}}}}.
notes: * ''Astral Infusion'' can also be targeted on allied [[Champion summoned units|pets]].
* If Soraka is below 10% of her maximum health, ''Astral Infusion'' will only bring her down to 1 HP, similar to the mechanics of a health resource champion such as {{ci|Mordekaiser}}.
* {{ii|Spirit Visage}} will only increase the health donated to allies if the target ally possesses it, although owning it ''will'' boost the heal that Soraka receives from {{ai|Starcall|Soraka}}.

riot.name: Equinox
riot.description: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.
riot.tooltip:
Creates a zone at target location for 1.5 seconds, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemy Champions in the cast radius. Enemy Champions standing in the zone are silenced until they leave.

When the zone disappears, all enemy Champions still standing in the zone are rooted for {{ e1 }} second(s) and are dealt {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

e1.name: Equinox
e1.blurb: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Soraka''' deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemy champions in an area and creates a zone within that {{tip|silence|silences}} enemy champions standing on it.
e1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 230}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|140 to 460}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
e1.description2: After {{fd|1.5}} seconds the zone detonates, dealing the same {{as|magic damage}} to all enemy champions within and briefly {{tip|root|rooting}} them.
notes: * The silence is applied once every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.

riot.name: Wish
riot.description: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.
riot.tooltip: Calls upon divine powers to restore {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> Health to all allied Champions. Wish's power is increased by 50% on each Champion below 40% Health.

r1.name: Wish
r1.blurb: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Soraka''' calls upon the stars, {{tip|healing}} all allied champions, including {{tip|untargetable}} allies, and herself, which is increased by 50% on targets below {{as|{{sti|health|40% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}.
notes: * ''Wish'' will not credit Soraka for [[assist]]ing in a kill if the target ally is at full health.
